thread.title: Dubai-based BetterBooking.com partners with DHISCO - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Dubai-based BetterBooking.com partners with DHISCO - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Dubai-based BetterBooking.com partners with DHISCO Published on : Wednesday, August 19, 2015
BetterBooking.com, one of the Middle East’s fastest growing tour operators, has selected DHISCO, the world’s leading hospitality distribution company, to power its international expansion.
Based in Dubai and with offices in Malaysia and the United States, Betterbooking.com, is one of the region’s leading hotel reservations agencies, connecting leisure and business travel professionals with hotels and other travel providers around the world.
“Our partnership with Betterbooking.com advances our strategic focus on helping travel companies in emerging countries automate their systems and grow with our advanced and affordable solutions for connecting the world,” said Toni Portmann, DHISCO chief executive officer.
Last week, DHISCO announced a similar partnership with a Dubai-based destination marketing company, Darina Holidays.
Owned by Silver Wings Travel, BetterBooking.com currently provides bookings through its call centers and XML integrations with other third parties. By partnering with DHISCO, it will be able to further automate its booking process.
“Our integration with DHISCO is key to our future,” said Pirooz Kimiaei, BetterBooking.com chief executive officer. “Demand for our services is high and growing. This partnership will enable us to keep up with that demand and offer our clients real-time connections to suppliers around the globe.”
